cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on May 26, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1734, Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act Amendments of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 45 (Wednesday, March 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARTWRIGHT:
H.R. 1734.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 (relating to the power of
Congress to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among
the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.)
[Page H1326]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 407.

title: Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act Amendments of 2021
